Rasulullah (Salalaahu Alayhi Wasalam) is reported to have said that Surah Ikhlaas is equivellent to one third of the Quraan (Tirmizi). Therefore if one recites this sura thrice, it is as though he/she has recited the entire Quraan.

We have not come accross any proof that indicates towards the souls coming down on the occasion of Qadr and Hajj.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
